title: Breaking Away: Episode 168
description:
2017 in Northern Ireland. This episode looks at two men who had been part of a paramilitary organisation and how they tried to leave the group. It is a tragic tale of intimidation, violence and ultimately murder. Leaving two sets of families utterly devastated as two men lost their lives.

Ticket for live show, 19 February:
https://feverup.com/m/81148
